dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.resource.res.log.tip.nrf.Route
dataStructure.description:
This object class represents a partially ordered list of Cross-Connects defining the route for a Subnetwork Connection. See R_TMF518_NRF_I_0035 and R_TMF518_NRF_I_0036.

This entity is optional

This entity is extendable

This entity does not generate Object Creation notifications

This entity does not generate Object Deletion notifications

This entity does not generate Object Discovery notifications

This entity generates Attribute Value Change notifications.
dataStructure.label: Route

child.name: routeIdentifier
child.description:
This attribute contains the unique identifier within the SNC name.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC disabled
child.label: routeIdentifier

child.name: crossConnectList
child.description:
This attribute represents a route for a Subnetwork Connection. The Cross-Connects are listed from the NE on which the SNC starts (first entry) to the NE on which the SNC ends (last entry) and the aEnd(G)TpList and zEnd(G)TpList will name CTPs of the same or equivalent layer rate only.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC disabled
child.label: crossConnectList

child.name: isIntendedRoute
child.description:
This attribute defines the purpose of the route.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC disabled
child.label: isIntendedRoute

child.name: actualState
child.description:
This attribute defines the actual summary state of the Cross-Connects (CCs) associated to the Route.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: actualState

child.name: isInUseBy
child.description:
This attribute defines if at least one of the routes Cross-Connects or CTPs is carrying traffic of another SNC (True).

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC disabled
child.label: isInUseBy

child.name: isExclusive
child.description:
This attribute defines that not any other routes of other SNCs can share any of the routes Cross Connects or CTPs, even in pending state (True).

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC disabled
child.label: isExclusive

child.name: additionalInformation
child.description:
This attribute allows the communication from the target OS to the requesting OS of additional information which is not explicitly modelled.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: additionalInformation

child.name: administrativeState
child.description:
This attribute defines administratively the role that the Route shall play for the belonging SNC. There is not any relationship with the actualState attribute of the Route. It can have the following values: - "locked", the route is not allowed to be active - "unlocked", the route is allowed to be active.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: administrativeState

child.name: subNetworkConnection
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association SncIsCharacterisedByRoutes

This association end is optional
child.label: subNetworkConnection
